author: Jane C. Timm
title: Fact check: Trump claims U.S. coronavirus cases have peaked. Not so fast, doctors say.
description: Trump, eager to restart the economy, has suggested that the worst has passed. But there's no way to know without mass testing, one expert said.
content: President Donald Trump, seizing on recent signs of progress in hard-hit areas like Seattle and New York City, has said coronavirus cases in the U.S. have peaked, suggesting that the worst of the pandemic is over as he encourages states to ease up on restricti… [+3575 chars]
